attributes.action: Introduce to UK, the US travel ban from the same 7 countries and use same policy
attributes.additional_details: Ot is not racist or xenophobic, it is logical to try to do something to try to save lives and fight terrorism
attributes.background: In the interest of public safety I would like this policy introduced. There have been six terrorist attacks in Britain in 6 months and a fortune of public money is spent of policing terrorists who want to attack this country from within.

rejection.details: As we understand it, there are currently 8 countries to which a travel ban applies in the USA. We're not sure which countries you would like the UK to adopt this policy for.
